database.name: VIEW OBPOS_USERPOS
database.view: SELECT c.ad_user_id AS obpos_userpos_id, c.ad_client_id, c.ad_org_id, c.isactive, c.created, c.createdby, c.updated, c.updatedby, c.name, c.description, c.c_bpartner_id, c.default_ad_client_id, c.default_ad_org_id, c.default_ad_role_id, c.default_m_warehouse_id, img.binarydata FROM ad_user c JOIN c_bpartner bp ON bp.c_bpartner_id = c.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN ad_image img ON img.ad_image_id = bp.em_obpos_ad_image_id WHERE c.password IS NOT NULL AND bp.isemployee = 'Y' AND bp.issalesrep = 'Y' AND bp.em_obpos_ispos = 'Y'
